forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then clearing with ample sunshine by the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with mostly sunny conditions during the afternoon hours. High 62F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 18C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 65F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with areas of fog developing after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 61F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
